entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 8:00 PM PDT Monday 20 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 8.5°C
Wind: ENE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind light except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind light except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait early in the morning. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 20 March 2023
